name: XREATORS
description: XREATORS presents an NFT marketplace where you can meet creators in a special way using NFT(Non-Fungible Token) blockchain technology. We created XREATORS to solve the problems that content creators are facing in the digital content industry. XREATORS provide solutions to unfair commercial practices such as intellectual property infringement and unfair distribution of profit. Our mission is to multiply the value of the creator who creates digital content. While adding value by protecting the rights and profits of the content creators and helping them secure their unique creativity in the digital space.
